title: How to appeal a ban?
body: How do i appeal a ban? I dont think its far that i get banned when multiple players are harassing me about my player skill and I cant defend myself? I think thats really unfair conduct and league of legends should look more into harassment then just focusing on trolls reporting people

replies.body: You can always reach out to our player behavior team for the full context on why your account was punished by shooting them a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
